base_character.name: lora_chibi
base_character.base_prompt: masterpiece, best quality, chibi anime character, cute style, single character, full body, standing pose, centered, white background, appearance: short black bob hair, straight style, large kawaii eyes, sparkle highlights, simple facial features, cute expression, outfit: red jacket with white stripes, blue pants, white sneakers with red details, art style: chibi proportions, 2 heads tall, cute anime style, clean outlines, bright vibrant colors, flat cel shading, high quality illustration, sharp focus, front view, symmetrical

negative_prompt: lowres, bad quality, blurry, realistic, photorealistic, 3d, extra limbs, bad anatomy, multiple characters, background elements, pixel art, mosaic, cropped, out of frame, sketch, rough lines
